item.description:
Boston Ecademy combines offline events with the online networking at Ecademy Site to maximize your networking experience. Please try to invite a friend to join us for this meeting.

Our target attendance for this meeting is 15-20 people! Become a member and RSVP "Yes" or "Maybe" by 4:00PM of January 18th and the cost will be $5.00. Members who do not RSVP will be charged $10.00 at the door. Join today membership is free! For non-members, the charge will be $12.00 at the door.

Proposed Agenda:

Proposed Agenda:
6:00 - Introductions and Wine & Refreshments - Cathy Chapman
6:20 - Surprise Agenda Item - Ellie Vogel
6:40 - Getting and Giving Help - Phil
7:00 - Online/Offline Networking Discussion - Phil
7:10 - Speed Networking - All
7:20 - Speaker - Christian Tosi's friend
7:40 - Building Boston Ecademy - Phil

For more information, see http://www.ecademy.co...
item.name: Boston Ecademy
